name: Last Bread
description:
Do you have what it takes to bake the last bread?

Potential seizure warning.

The game has 3 different endings and amazing drawings done by Anastasiia in just two days!

Controls:
  • Mouse for everything (click on the oven to bake bread)
Recommended settings:
  • Volume on
  • Fullscreen
Developers:
  • Anastasiia Danyliuk - 2D Artist, Animator
  • Anya Leonova - Programmer, Writer
Additional assets used:
  • Music: Relax by Francisco Alvear
  • Music: Swing is the Answer by Diego Nava
  • That one popular meme (no spoilers)

Originally made for the Totally Ranked Jam 2020. The theme was "The End of the World", but we really liked the theme "Bread" that didn't get as many votes as we hoped. So, you know. We had to do this.
